HERO_SUBTITLE: Empower your municipality with ORATOR - the complete digital communication platform that connects citizens, manages content, and delivers real-time information across all channels.
FEATURE_SMART_CITY_DESC: Digital solutions tailored to municipalities. Connect citizens with real-time information while maintaining transparency and improving communication.
FEATURE_VISIBILITY_DESC: Through digital signage and mobile apps, content reaches more citizens and enables better engagement with your community.
FEATURE_ANALYTICS_DESC: Harness the power of real-time analytics. Track engagement, monitor display health, and make data-driven decisions to better serve your community.
FEATURE_VALUE_DESC: Advanced digital infrastructure without financial or operational risk, built on a proven platform designed for municipalities.
FEATURE_REALTIME_DESC: Your content updates instantly across all displays. Respond to emergencies, announce events, and keep citizens informed in real-time.
FEATURE_SETUP_DESC: Intuitive platform designed for municipal teams. Manage all content, displays, and citizen interactions from a single unified dashboard.
BENEFITS_SUBTITLE: ORATOR delivers your content seamlessly across outdoor digital totems, indoor displays, web portals, and mobile devices - all managed from a single dashboard.
BENEFITS_MULTI_DISPLAY: Multi-display support (outdoor totems, indoor screens, mobile)
TRANSFORM_SUBTITLE: Real-time communication that strengthens the bond between municipalities and their communities.
DEMO_ERROR_CAPTCHA: Please verify that you are not a robot
